text: <@U01QVR44MEY> To be honest, I don't have experience creating a workflow. What do you mean by *Just set a createdate known field for the workflow enrollment trigger, then use custom code to lookup the latest note?* I really appreciate your help.

Were we given any indication of when the CMS React beta stuff might be available for testing? I know we can "sign up" for it now, but are people able to actually test it now through the beta or is it coming soon:tm:?

<@UTUESGAS3> I think this article will be of immense help to you. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/create-workflows> I can help build your custom code action if you want. really it's just a nodejs serverless function that will call the necessary HubSpot apis
I would really appreciate if you can build me a custom code action. I have no idea how create the custom code action.
